agreements: Unlock remains blocked because policy overrides are still stubbed and core evidence (four-agent roster, schema validation, HAL diff) is missing.
Documentation placeholders (unlock-notes.md, mock-hal.diff, fixture-size.txt) are acceptable for rehearsal but must be replaced with real artifacts before unlock.
Next steps include rerunning guardrails without stubs, capturing schema-validated telemetry, and refreshing checksums on a clean tree.
conflicts_resolved: Agents confirmed branch spec-auto-telemetry remains dirty due to evidence updates; decision was to keep unlock locked until follow-up runs clean the tree and capture real evidence.
